tool.name: Transcriptome UHR Quality Control
tool.description: Quality Control Assessment of New Transcriptome UHR Sample Against Background Cohort

param.name: background_cohort
param.label: Background Cohort
param.help: text file defining background cohort samples

param.name: validation_targets
param.label: Validation Targets
param.help: file defining list of validation targets for cancer related genes of interest

param.name: new_sample_counts
param.label: New sample counts data
param.help: Kallisto counts output for new sample

param.name: gene_set
param.label: Gene Set
param.help: List of cancer related genes of interest

param.name: targets_to_genes_bed
param.label: Target Map
param.help: File that maps genes to target IDs (bed coordinates)

param.name: kallisto_matrix
param.label: Kallisto Counts Matrix
param.help: Kallisto counts matrix for all UHR samples

tool.help: This tool performs a quality control assessment of a new UHR sample against a pre-defined background cohort.
